GenerateCSRAndImport.description: This action generates Certificate Singing Request(CSR), signs and imports the singed certificate.
GenerateCSRAndImport.longDescription: This action will generate a Certificate Singing Request(CSR), sign the certificate using the uploaded Custom Signing Certificate(CSC) and will import the singed certificate.

GetLastGeneratedCSR.description: This action returns last generated CSR.
GetLastGeneratedCSR.longDescription: This action returns last generated CSR. The response will contain a signing request that a certificate authority (CA) will sign.

title: #DellCertificateService
